DOC.brief_summary: We develop novel Brillouin microscopy test potential keratoconus ectasia diagnostics . We plan perform axial scan cornea human volunteer order compare biomechanical property Keratoconus vs. Normal cornea compare biomechanical property post-LASIK ectasia vs. normal cornea .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Test Diagnostic Potential Brillouin Microscopy Corneal Ectasia
DOC.criteria: Group I include healthy subject normal appear cornea , normal topography pachymetry . Group II include patient diagnosed mild , moderate advance keratoconus ophthalmology expert basis topography pachymetry . Group III include healthy subject undergone LASIK surgery past 12 month without complication . Inclusion criterion include normal postoperative topography pachymetry . Group IV include patient ( age 20 60 ) undergone LASIK surgery least 12 month study image diagnosed postLASIK ectasia base topography , pachymetry clinical evaluation . Volunteers Have occludable narrow angle ( without patent peripheral iridotomy ) Monocular subject Do understand instruction image
